title: iPod touch is now completely sold out in the US Apple Online Store
content:
It has only been one day since Apple discontinued the iPod touch forever. And although the company said that customers could still buy the product “while supplies last,” it seems that the supplies didn’t last very long. Right now, the iPod touch is completely sold out in the US Apple Online Store.

more…

The post iPod touch is now completely sold out in the US Apple Online Store appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: While the now discontinued iPod touch would remain available in stores while supplies last, it is now completely sold out in the US.
